frontmatter.title: Getting Started
frontmatter.meta_title: CeStore - ReactJS web app & React Native mobile app for e-commerce
frontmatter.meta_description: React Native currently creates vibrant wave in mobile application development. “Write once, Run anywhere”, then you can effectively produce mobile app across all platforms including iOS & Android by one language with “Native effect”.

markdownRemark.html:
CeStore is destination for A-Z e-commerce solution from store’s mobile-friendly website to mobile application. CeStore helps you to build your online sale touchpoint from scratch.

Coding languages are ReactJS and React Native frameworks, which are 2 most popular and optimized frameworks for your today launch store.

What you will get?

  • Full source code package built with ReactJS and React Native frameworks.
  • Completed solutions for e-commerce business.
  • Super fast website and mobile app
  • Admin dashboard is support to manage the product.
  • Build with: NodeJS, Express, MongoDB, React Native….
  • No dependency to your existing website templates.
  • Easy to installing and delivery your own app.
  • Saving your plus 1000 hours of development and a great boilerplate to kickoff your project
  • Build your standalone app and delivery to both Appstore & Google Play
  • Run smoothly and already well testing on both of iOS & Android from the QA team.
  • Get free regular version update & coming new features.
  • Awesome support from technical team and great community – https://github.com/inspireui/support/issues
  • High coding quality from the Elite Author of Envato – https://codecanyon.net/user/inspireui
  • 100% refund if you are not happy with the products.
  • Note: as the website project is base on the Cezerin framework we will not support any issues related to the website, delivery or hosting issues.

Reference

  • iOS demo: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/cestore/id1434287066?mt=8
  • Android demo: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.inspireui.cestore
  • Website demo: http://cestore.inspireui.com
  • Company website: https://inspireui.com/product/cestore
  • Document: http://inspireui.github.io/cestore
  • Support: https://github.com/inspireui/support/issues</
